parameters.name: attachResourceType
parameters.description: The resource attachment type (not yet in use).

parameters.name: attachResourceTypes
parameters.description: The resource attachment types, separated by commas.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: withParentResource
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return parent resource attachments.
